----
const response = await client.search({
  index: "products",
  size: 0,
  query: {
    match: {
      name: "led tv",
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    resellers: {
      nested: {
        path: "resellers",
      },
      aggs: {
        filter_reseller: {
          filter: {
            bool: {
              filter: [
                {
                  term: {
                    "resellers.reseller": "companyB",
                  },
                },
              ],
            },
          },
          aggs: {
            min_price: {
              min: {
                field: "resellers.price",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
